welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Eastern Goleta Valley, where the charm of small-town America meets the beauty of the California coast. Known for our stunning beaches, quaint shops, and friendly locals, we invite you to explore and experience all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Santa Barbara Metropolitan Area Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Regional Terminal
terminals.description: The regional terminal at Santa Barbara Metropolitan Area Airport serves smaller regional airlines and private flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free Wi-Fi network by selecting 'SBA Free Wi-Fi' from the list of available networks.
